trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReadAttribute"></xref> and <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleWriteAttribute"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: Representa a classe base para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReadAttribute"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleWriteAttribute"> </xref> classes.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReadWriteAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada numa classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReadWriteAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The path to target of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: O caminho de destino do atributo.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAttributeTarget"></xref> enumeration value that determines how to use path to find target.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAttributeTarget"></xref>valor de enumeração que determina como utilizar o caminho para localizar o destino.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the target of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o caminho para o destino do atributo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAttributeTarget"></xref> enumeration value that determines how to use path to find target.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAttributeTarget"> </xref> valor de enumeração que determina como utilizar o caminho para localizar o destino.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAttributeTarget"></xref> enumeration value that determines how to use the specified path to find target.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAttributeTarget"> </xref> valor de enumeração que determina como utilizar o caminho especificado para localizar o destino.
